game.beginning: The year is 2256, and humanity has colonized several planets in the distant reaches of the galaxy.
game.ending: After defeating the evil alien overlord, Xarath, you are hailed as a hero and become known throughout the galaxy as the savior of the human colonies.
game.synopsis: In the depths of space, an ancient civilization has been awakened, threatening to destroy all that humanity has achieved. Players take on the role of a skilled space explorer who must navigate treacherous asteroid fields, hostile alien encounters, and derelict spacecraft to uncover the secrets behind Xarath's power and put an end to his evil plans.
game.title: Galactic Odyssey
